API Keys provide Ownership access to this project. Please be careful when allocating and distributing them. Never user an API Key within a front-end application!

How to use API Keys

API Keys allow you to provide Ownership access to other systems external to Form.io.

This is done by providing the following keys either within the x-token header, or the token query parameter.

Examples:

  • GET - {{ apiProtocol }}//myproject.{{ apiServer }}/myform?token=23234lkj234lklkj234lkj2lkj34
  • GET - {{ apiProtocol }}//myproject.{{ apiServer }}/myform
    • Header: x-token
    • Value: 23234lkj234lklkj234lkj2lkj34
